title: On Data Engineering for Scaling LLM Terminal Capabilities
key_contribution: Data engineering and training strategies for agents to master terminal/shell interaction as a structured RL environment.

title: KLong: Training LLM Agent for Extremely Long-horizon Tasks
key_contribution: Trajectory-splitting SFT + progressive RL + Research-Factory distillation to address long-horizon human-data scarcity.

title: K-Search: LLM Kernel Generation via Co-Evolving Intrinsic World Model
key_contribution: Treats CUDA kernel generation as search, using an intrinsic world model for performance prediction during RL optimization.

title: Agents of Chaos
key_contribution: Large-scale live-environment red-teaming with persistent tools (email/Discord/files), generating edge-case human-interaction data.

title: Aletheia tackles FirstProof autonomously
key_contribution: Autonomous mathematical research in formal proof environments with verifiable rewards.
